idea:
We at Leatherclue are committed to offering selected 100% pure leather products, which meet our quality standards, and to delivering delight to the recipient, with the special care that we take in packaging and delivering your gift for you and your loved ones. We are Mumbai-based company, with a young, enthusiastic and committed team, experienced management, and leading edge technology to ensure that we deliver delight each time you order with us. At Leatherclue, we strive to provide our customers with quality products at the best prices possible. All the while, we make all efforts to give them a level of service that they will never forget, making them want to come back for more. .We at Leatherclue provide our customers with:

Wider range for selection of products.

Convenient buying experience.

On time delivery of products.

Faster resolution of any concern

We will hugely appreciate your feedback to help us improve. Do connect with us at info@leatherclue.com and let us know how we are doing.
name: Leatherclue
